author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

I was checking out how to migrate the `GEDPhotonProducer` to ESGetTokens.

One of the helper classes that must be migrated is the `EGEnergyCorrector` in EgammaTools. Besides some overall code modernization, this PR partially migrates the `EGEnergyCorrector` to ESGetTokens. It will be followed up with another PR to complete the migration, but I think it's better to do it step-by-step to keep the amount of changes to review at a reasonable size.

Since I noticed that the EGEnergyCorrector is not used for electrons anymore, the functions in this class that support electrons were removed. Electrons seem to exclusively use the newer regression modifiers.


#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles and local matrix tests pass.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport intended.
title: Partially migrate EGEnergyCorrector to ESGetTokens and remove support for electrons
